4304570.name: Cannibal Date
4304570.description:
Cannibal Date is a story-driven visual novel about pursuing a relationship with a woman suspected of being a cannibal, all while a wary detective keeps you under close watch. Win her over, make friends across the city, uncover hidden secrets, and gather clues for the detective. Through dialogue choices and interactions with the people around the city, you’ll build (or ruin) relationships, dig up secrets, and decide who you trust. What you say and do affects how others see you, how much suspicion you draw, and how the story ends.

Gameplay Features

  • Branching dialogue and character-driven storytelling

  • Relationship system where choices affect trust, affection, and suspicion

  • Multiple endings based on your decisions and character relationships

  • Investigation mechanics: gather clues and report findings to the detective

Estimated playtime: 5 hours 

What’s Included in the Full Game

  • The complete five-day story with several locations to explore and characters to talk to

  • Fully developed romance route with multiple outcomes

  • Complete investigation system, including clue collection and decision-making that affect the result of the investigation

  • Branching dialogue and choices that meaningfully affect relationships for all prominent characters

  • Multiple story paths and endings based on how you play
4304570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
